mapper.select: select number from t_store where status = 0 and white != 'QA' and name not like '%测试%'
select concat('\'',code,'\'') as storeno from t_store where status = 0 and white != 'QA' and name not like '%测试%'
select count(*) from t_store where status = 0 and white != 'QA' and name not like '%测试%' and number IN (${storeids})
